title: F/S - Emil Batch T206 oddity - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: F/S - Emil Batch T206 oddity - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is an Emil Batch T206 Piedmont 350 which was graded by PSA as 4MC.  The card is oversized vertically with just a sliver of white border at the top, but at the bottom you can see the first bit of the blue background of the next card on the sheet.  Asking $60 delivered...

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/BatchSmall/web.jpg[/IMG]

hello,

nice card!!!i'de pick it up, but have one just like it...haven't seen another in many years...

good price too!!

good luck

johnny
I'll take it. Please send me payment information. I will get payment out soon.

The card is yours, Lee.  PM sent with payment details.
